name: when-lambo-monorepo
description: The bot that will make us rich
author: Two beautiful guys

scripts.predeploy: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git commit -a -m "Publish version $PACKAGE_VERSION" && git push origin master && git checkout develop && git rebase master && git push origin develop && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npx pm2 deploy one update && npx pm2 deploy two update && npx pm2 deploy three update && npx pm2 deploy four update
